metadata.name: Potential RDP Tunneling Via SSH
metadata.comment: Execution of ssh.exe to perform data exfiltration and tunneling through RDP

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\ssh.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':3389')))

output.summary: Execution of ssh.exe to perform data exfiltration and tunneling through RDP
